KiPower.NAME: Ki
DESCRIPTIONS: Used to empower your different abilities

Revive.NAME: Revive
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemy will revive when killed with full HP and extra buffs.

Reflection.NAME: Reflection
DESCRIPTIONS: Reflects damage back to the attacker.

BurningSoul.NAME: Burning Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: Spend Ki to gain gain Ki Barrier charges at the end of every turn.

KiExplosion.NAME: Ki Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked by an enemy, deal back damage equal to the amount of Ki Barrier charges. Expires at end of turn.

ComboPower.NAME: Combo Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: Consume a Combo Chain with a Combo Finisher for enhanced effects
